103.name: Vorm een Torpedo Groep!
103.desc: Gebruik naast 5 DD's een CL als vlaggenschip in de hoofdvloot.

104.name: Vorm een Vloot met Zes Schepen!

105.name: Vorm een Groep met Twee CL!

107.name: Vorm een Vliegkampschip Aanvalsvloot!
107.desc: Gebruik naast 3 DD's een CV/CVL als vlaggenschip in de hoofdvloot.

108.name: Vorm een Groep met de Tenryuu-klasse Kruisers!
108.desc: Gebruik Tenryuu (天龍) en Tatsuta (龍田) in de hoofdvloot.

109.name: Vorm een Groep met de Sendai-Klasse Kruisers!
109.desc: Gebruik Sendai (川内), Jintsuu (神通) en Naka (那珂) in de hoofdvloot.

110.name: Vorm een Groep met de Myoukou-Klasses Kruisers!
110.desc: Gebruik Myoukou (妙高), Nachi (那智), Ashigara (足柄) en Haguro (羽黒) in de hoofdvloot.

111.name: Vorm een Groep met de Fusou-Klasse Slagschepen!
111.desc: Gebruik Fusou (扶桑) en Yamashiro (山城) in de hoofdvloot.

112.name: Vorm een Groep met de Ise-Klasse Slagschepen!
112.desc: Gebruik Ise (伊勢) en Hyuuga (日向) in de hoofdvloot.

113.name: Vorm een Hoofdvloot met Slagschepen en Zware Kruisers!
113.desc: Gebruik een BB en 2 CA's in de hoofdvloot.

114.name: Vorm de Nagumo Aanvalsvloot!
114.desc: Gebruik alleen Akagi (赤城), Kaga (加賀), Hiryuu (飛龍) en Souryuu (蒼龍) in de hoofdvloot.

115.name: Vorm een Tweede Vloot!
115.desc: Gebruik een schip als vlaggenschip in de tweede vloot.

116.name: Maak een Vliegtuigtender Gevechtsklaar
116.desc: Gebruik een AV in de hoofdvloot.

117.name: Vorm een Vliegkampschip Aanvalsvloot in de Tweede Vloot!
117.desc: Gebruik 3 DD's en een CV/CVL als vlaggenschip in de tweede vloot.

118.name: Vorm een Groep met de Kongou-Klasse Slagschepen!
118.desc: Gebruik Kongou (金剛), Hiei (比叡), Haruna (榛名) en Kirishima (霧島) in de hoofdvloot.

119.name: Vorm de Mikawa Vloot!
119.desc: Gebruik Choukai (鳥海), Aoba (青葉), Kako (加古), Furutaka (古鷹), Tenryuu (天龍) en een snel type schip in de hoofdvloot.

120.name: Vorm de Torpedobootjager Divisie 6!
120.desc: Gebruik alleen Akatsuki (暁), Hibiki (響), Inazuma (雷) en Ikazuchi (電) in de hoofdvloot.

121.name: Vorm de Kruiser Divisie 4!
121.desc: Gebruik Atago (愛宕), Takao (高雄), Choukai (鳥海) en Maya (摩耶) in de hoofdvloot.

122.name: Vorm de Nishimura Vloot!
122.desc: Gebruik Fusou (扶桑), Yamashiro (山城), Mogami (最上) en Shigure (時雨) in de hoofdvloot.

123.name: Vorm de Vliegkampschip Divisie 5!
123.desc: Gebruik Shoukaku (翔鶴), Zuikaku (瑞鶴) en 2 DD's in de hoofdvloot.

124.name: Vorm de Nieuwe Mikawa Vloot!
124.desc: Gebruik Choukai (鳥海), Aoba (青葉), Kinugasa (衣笠), Kako (加古), Furutaka (古鷹) en Tenryuu (天龍) in de hoofdvloot.

126.name: Vorm een Marine Luchtvaartdienst Aanvalsvloot!
126.desc: Gebruik 2 BBV's en 2 CAV's in de hoofdvloot.

128.name: Vorm de Kruiser Divisie 6!
128.desc: Gebruik Furutaka (古鷹), Kako(加古), Aoba (青葉) en Kinugasa (衣笠) in de hoofdvloot.

129.name: Vorm de 5de Vloot!
129.desc: Gebruik Nachi (那智), Ashigara (足柄), Tama (多摩), en Kiso (木曾) in de vloot.

130.name: Vorm de Torpedo Groep 1!
130.desc: Gebruik Abukuma (阿武隈), Akebono (曙), Ushio (潮), Kasumi (霞) en Shiranui (不知火) in de vloot.

131.name: Vorm de Torpedobootjager Divisie 8!
131.desc: Gebruik Asashio (朝潮), Michishio (満潮), Ooshio (大潮) en Arashio (荒潮) in de vloot.

132.name: Vorm de Torpedobootjager Divisie 18!
132.desc: Gebruik alleen Kasumi (霞), Arare (霰), Kagerou (陽炎) en Shiranui (不知火) in de vloot.

133.name: Vorm de Torpedobootjager Divisie 30 (1ste Generatie)!
133.desc: Gebruik alleen Mutsuki (睦月), Kisaragi (如月), Yayoi (弥生) en Mochizuki (望月) in de vloot.

134.desc: Organiseer je gevoelens en gebruik een vloot met een hoog geleveld schip als vlaggenschip(Lv.90~99)!

135.name: Opnieuw op Reis!
135.desc: Organiseer een vloot met 6 schepen en je pas getrouwde schip van Lv.100 of hoger als vlaggenschip!

136.name: Vorm de 30ste Torpedobootjager Vloot (2de Generatie)
136.desc: Gebruk alleen Mutsuki (睦月), Yayoi (弥生), Uzuki (卯月) en Mochizuki (望月) in de vloot.

137.name: Vorm de 5de Vloot
137.desc: Gebruik Myoukou (妙高), Nachi (那智) en Haguro (羽黒) in de vloot.

138.name: Vorm de 2de Vliegkampschip Divisie
138.desc: Gebruik Hiryuu Kai Ni (飛龍改二, als vlaggenschip), Souryuu (蒼龍) en 2 torpedobootjagerand in de vloot.

139.name: Vorm de 6de Onderzeeër Vloot
139.desc: Gebruik een onderzeeër tender en 4 (of meer) onderzeeërs in de vloot.

140.name: Test de Nieuwe RADAR!
140.desc: Gebruik Myoukou Kai2 als vlaggenschip in de vloot.

141.name: Herorganiseer en Versterk de 2de Vliegkampschip Divisie
141.desc: Gebruik Souryuu Kai-2 (蒼龍改二) als vlaggenschip met Hiryuu Kai-2 (飛龍改二) en 2 torpedobootjagers in de vloot.

142.name: Organiseer de 3de Elite Slagschip Divisie
142.desc: Gebruik alle vier de Kongou-Klasse Kai 2 Slagschepen in de hoofdvloot.

143.name: Neem het Nieuwe Standaard Vliegkampschip in Gebruik
143.desc: Gebruik Unryuu (雲龍) als het vlaggenschip.

144.name: Organiseer de Hoofd Slagschips Groep: 2de Divisie
144.desc: Gebruik beide Nagato-Klasse en beide Fusou-klasse slagschepen (En geen andere schepen) in de hoofdvloot.

145.name: Organiseer de Hoofd Slagschips Groep
145.desc: Gebruik drie slagschepen van de Nagato, Fusou, Ise of Yamato Klasse en een lichte kruiser in de vloot.

146.name: Het Arsenaal Voorbereiding op Renovatie
146.desc: Gebruik Akashi (明石) als vlaggenschip in de hoofdvloot.

147.name: Organiseer de Nishimura Vloot
147.desc: Gebruik Fusou (扶桑), Yamashiro (山城), Mogami (最上), Shigure (時雨) en Michishio (満潮) in de hoofdvloot.

148.name: Organiseer een Tegenaanvals Groep
148.desc: Gebruik Kasumi (霞) als vlaggenschip, Ashigara (足柄), 1 CL en 3 DD's in de hoofdvloot.

149.name: Organiseer de 11de Torpedobootjager Divisie
149.desc: Gebruik de 4 speciale torpedobootjagers: Fubuki (吹雪), Shirayuki(白雪), Hatsuyuki (初雪) en Murakumo(叢雲) in de hoofdvloot. Een van deze schepen moet het vlaggenschip zijn.

150.name: Organiseer de 21ste Torpedobootjager Divisie
150.desc: Gebruik alleen Hatsuharu (初春), Nenohi (子日), Wakaba (若葉) en Hatsushimo (初霜) in de hoofdvloot.

151.name: Organiseer de 22ste Torpedobootjager Divisie
151.desc: Gebruik alleen Satsuki (皐月), Fumizuki (文月), Nagatsuki (長月) en 1 DD in de hoofdvloot.

152.name: Organiseer de Nieuwe Editie van de Mikawa Vloot
152.desc: Gebruik Choukai Kai2 als vlaggenschip en vijf willekeurige schepen van de Aoba, Kinugasa, Kako, Furutaka, Tenryuu of Yuubari klasse in de hoofdvloot

153.name: Herorganiseer de 18de Groep!
153.desc: Gebruik Tenryuu, Tatsuta en 2 of meer andere schepen in de vloot

154.name: Organiseer de Oppervlakte Aanvalsvloot!
154.desc: Gebruik Hiei, Kirishima, Nagara, Akatsuki, Ikazuchi en Inazuma in de vloot

155.name: Organiseer de Nieuwe 6de Torpedobootjager Divisie!
155.desc: Gebruik Akatsuki Kai2 als vlaggenschip met Hibiki/Bep, Ikazuchi en Inazuma in de vloot

156.name: 1ste Torpedo Groep, Bereid Jullie je Voor op Een Snelle Tocht naar de Noordelijke Zee
156.desc: Gebruik Abukuma als vlaggenschip met Hibiki/Вер, Hatsushimo, Wakaba, Samidare en Shimakaze in de hoofdvloot

157.name: 1ste Torpedo Groep, Bereid Jullie je Voor op Nog Een Snelle Tocht naar de Noordelijke Zee
157.desc: Gebruik Abukuma Kai Ni als vlaggenschip met Hibiki/Вер, Yuugumo, Naganami, Akigumo en Shimakaze in de hoofdvloot

161.name: Herorganiseer de 5de Vliegkampschip Divisie!
161.desc: Gebruik Shoukaku, Zuikaku, Oboro en Akigumo in de hoofdvloot

162.name: Bereid de Nieuwe 21ste Groep voor op een Gevecht
162.desc: Gebruik Nachi(Kai-2), Ashigara(Kai-2), Tama en Kiso in de hoofdvloot

163.name: Organiseer de 16de Groep (1ste Generatie)
163.desc: Gebruik Ashigara als vlaggenschip met Kuma en Nagara in de hoofdvloot

202.name: First Sortie!
202.desc: Deploy your main fleet on a combat mission.

203.name: Protect the Seas of Chinju-Fu!
203.desc: Deploy to World 1-1 and clear the stage.

204.name: Sortie to the Coast of Nansei Islands!
204.desc: Deploy to World 1-2 and clear the stage.

205.name: Intercept Approaching Enemy Vanguard Fleet!
205.desc: Deploy to World 1-2 after defeating its boss and clear the stage.

206.name: Sortie the Torpedo Squadron!
206.desc: Deploy a fleet with a CL as flagship and 3 DD as escorts.

207.name: Sortie a Heavy Cruiser!
207.desc: Deploy a fleet with a CA as its flagship.

208.name: Sortie a Battleship!
208.desc: Deploy a fleet with a BB as its flagship. BBV don't count.

209.name: Sortie a Carrier Task Force!
209.desc: Deply a fleet with CV(L) as flagship and 5 DD/CL/AV for the escorts.

215.name: Second Fleet Sortie!
215.desc: Deploy your 2nd Fleet on a combat mission.

219.name: Sortie the Mikawa Fleet!
219.desc: Deploy a fleet with Choukai, Aoba, Kako, Furutaka, Tenryuu and another fast ship.

222.name: Sortie the Destroyer Division 6!
222.desc: Deploy a fleet with ONLY Akatsuki, Hibiki, Inazuma, and Ikazuchi.

223.name: Sortie the Cruiser Division 4!
223.desc: Deploy a fleet with Atago, Takao, Choukai, Maya and any 2 ships. Score a victory against World 2-2 Boss.

224.name: Sortie the Nishimura Fleet!
224.desc: Deploy a fleet with Fusou, Yamashiro, Mogami, Shigure and any 2 ships. Score a victory against World 2-3 Boss.

225.name: Sortie the Carrier Division 5!
225.desc: Deploy a fleet with Shoukaku, Zuikaku and any 4 ships. Score a victory against World 3-1 Boss.

227.name: Sortie the New Mikawa Fleet!
227.desc: Deploy a fleet with Choukai, Aoba, Kinugasa, Kako, Furutaka and Tenryuu. Score a victory against World 2-3 Boss.

231.name: Sortie a Submarine Fleet!
231.desc: Deploy a fleet with 2 SS and 4 additional ships. Score a victory against World 2-3 Boss.

232.name: Sortie a Naval Aviation Strike Fleet!
232.desc: Deploy a fleet with 2 BBV, 2 CAV and 2 additional ships. Score a victory against World 4-2 Boss.

233.name: Sortie the Cruiser Division 6!
233.desc: Deploy a fleet with Furutaka, Kako, Kinugasa, Aoba and 2 additional ships. Score a S rank victory against World 2-3 Boss.

239.name: Sortie the Destroyer Division 8!
239.desc: Deploy a fleet with Asashio, Michishio, Ooshio, Arashio and 2 additional ships. Score a victory against World 2-3 Boss.

240.name: Sortie the Destroyer Division 18!
240.desc: Deploy a fleet with Kasumi, Arare, Kagerou, Shiranui and 2 additional ships. Score a victory against World 3-1 Boss.

244.name: Deploy the Destroyer Division 30 (Gen-1)
244.desc: Deploy a fleet that consists of Mutsuki (睦月), Kisaragi (如月), Yayoi (弥生), Mochizuki (望月) and up to 2 additional DDs or 1 DD with 1 CL as flagship to world 3-2 and encounter the boss. C rank or above is required.

245.name: In Preparation of Love! (Final)
245.desc: Deploy a fleet with a high level (Lv.90~99) flagship to 2-3 obtain an S rank victory against the boss.

246.name: Your First Mission Together!
246.desc: Deploy a fleet to 4-3 with a bonded ship of Lv.100 or more as flagship and score an S rank victory against the boss.

247.name: Sortie an aviation battleship fleet!
247.desc: Have 2 BBV ships in your main fleet and score a victory against World 4-4 Boss.

248.name: 30th Destroyer Fleet's Anti-Submarine Patrol
248.desc: Deploy Mutsuki, Yayoi, Uzuki and Mochizuki to World 1-5 and reach the boss, scoring at least a C rank.

250.name: Deploy the 2nd Carrier Division
250.desc: Deploy Hiryuu Kai Ni (飛龍改二) as the flagship, Souryuu (蒼龍) and two destroyers to World 5-2. You may add 2 other ships. Score an S rank victory against the boss.

251.name: Deploy the Elite 2nd Carrier Division
251.desc: Deploy Souryuu Kai Ni (蒼龍改二) as the flagship, Hiryuu Kai Ni (飛龍改二) and two destroyers to World 4-3. You may add 2 other ships. Score an S rank victory against the boss.

252.name: Deploy a Haruna-led Fleet
252.desc: Deploy a fleet with Haruna Kai Ni (榛名改二) as the flagship and up to 5 additional ships to World 5-1 and score an S rank victory against the boss.

253.name: Deploy the 601 Air Group
253.desc: Deploy a fleet with Unryuu Kai (雲龍改) as the flagship to World 5-2 and score an S rank victory against the boss.

254.name: Deploy a Light Carrier Squadron
254.desc: Sortie a fleet of 1-2 light aircraft carriers, 1 light cruiser and 3-4 destroyers to World 2-1 and score an S rank victory against the boss.

255.name: Deploy a Torpedo Squadron to Bashi Islands
255.desc: Sortie a fleet of 1-2 light cruisers (with one of them as the flagship) and 4-5 destroyers to World 2-2. Score a victory at the boss and sink the enemy flagship.

258.name: Sortie the 2nd Squadron
258.desc: Deploy Nagato (長門), Mutsu (陸奥), Fusou (扶桑), Yamashiro (山城) and up to 2 additional ships to World 4-2. Score two S rank victories at the boss node.

260.name: Deploy the Battleship Squadron in the Northern Waters
260.desc: Deploy two battleships, a light aircraft carrier and up to three additional ships to World 3-5 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

262.name: Deploy the Nishimura Fleet in the Southern Waters
262.desc: Deploy Fusou (扶桑), Yamashiro (山城), Mogami (最上), Shigure (時雨) and Michishio (満潮) (you may also add another ship) to World 5-1 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

263.name: Deploy the Sixth Squadron to the Southwestern Waters
263.desc: Deploy Furutaka (古鷹), Kako (加古), Aoba (青葉), Kinugasa (衣笠) and up to two additional ships to World 2-5 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

267.name: Deploy the 11th Destroyer Division
267.desc: Deploy Fubuki (吹雪), Shirayuki(白雪), Hatsuyuki (初雪), Murakumo(叢雲) and up to 2 additional ships to World 2-3 and score a victory at the boss node.

268.name: 11th Destroyer Division's Anti-Submarine Patrol
268.desc: Deploy Fubuki (吹雪), Shirayuki(白雪), Hatsuyuki (初雪) and Murakumo(叢雲) to World 1-5 and get a score of at least C at the boss node.

269.name: Deploy the 21st Destroyer Division
269.desc: Deploy Hatsuharu (初春), Nenohi (子日), Wakaba (若葉) and Hatsushimo (初霜) and up to 2 additional ships to World 3-1 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

270.name: Deploy the 22nd Destroyer Division
270.desc: Deploy Satsuki (皐月), Fumizuki (文月), Nagatsuki (長月), 1 more DD and up to two additional ships to World 1-4 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

271.name: Deploy Nachi's Squadron
271.desc: Sortie a fleet with Nachi (那智) as flagship, Hatsushimo (初霜), Kasumi (霞), Ushio (潮), Akebono (曙) and one additional ship to world 2-2 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

272.name: Deploy the Remodelled Anti-Aircraft Heavy Cruiser
272.desc: Sortie a fleet with Maya (摩耶) Kai or Kai2, 1 CL, 2 DD and up to two additional ships to World 2-3 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

273.name: Deploy the Mikawa Fleet to Solomon Islands
273.desc: Sortie the main fleet with Choukai Kai2 as the flagship and any five of Aoba, Kinugasa, Kako, Furutaka, Tenryuu, Yuubari to 5-1 and S-Rank the boss

274.name: 6th Destroyer Division's Anti-Submarine Patrol
274.desc: Deploy Akatsuki, Hibiki (響 or Верный), Inazuma and Ikazuchi to 1-5. C-Rank+ the boss

275.name: Deploy the 18th Squadron
275.desc: Tenryuu, Tatsuta, and at least 2 other ships to [W2-3] and S-rank the boss node

276.name: Sortie the surface attack fleet!
276.desc: Sortie Hiei, Kirishima, Nagara, Akatsuki, Ikazuchi, Inazuma to 5-1 and clear the map with an S-rank

277.name: DesDiv6 Anti-Submarine Mission!
277.desc: Sortie Akatsuki Kai2 , Hibiki/Verniy, Ikazuchi, Inazuma to 1-5 and clear the map with at least A-rank

278.name: Rush the 1st Torpedo Squadron to Operation KE
278.desc: Sortie Abukuma as flagship with Hibiki/Вер, Hatsushimo, Wakaba, Samidare and Shimakaze to 3-2 and B-Rank+ the boss

279.name: Rush the 1st Torpedo Squadron to Operation KE Again
279.desc: Sortie Abukuma Kai-2 as flagship with Hibiki/Вер, Yuugumo, Naganami, Akigumo and Shimakaze to 3-2 and B-Rank+ the boss

285.name: "Carrier Task Force", advance to the Northern Sea!
285.desc: Sortie a fleet with an aircraft carrier as flagship to 3-5 and S-Rank the boss

286.name: Strengthen the Anti-Submarine Patrol in Front of the Naval Base!
286.desc: Sortie to 1-5 and obtain 4 A-ranks (or better) at the boss

287.name: Sortie the 5th Carrier Division to the Southern Sea Coral Islands
287.desc: Sortie Shoukaku, Zuikaku, Oboro, Akigumo and up to 2 additional ships to W5-2 and S-Rank the boss

288.name: Sortie the New 21st Squadron to the North
288.desc: Sortie Nachi(Kai-2), Ashigara(Kai-2), Tama, Kiso and up to 2 additional ships to W3-1 and S-Rank the boss

289.name: Sortie the 16th Squadron (First Generation)
289.desc: Sortie Ashigara as flagship, Kuma, Nagara and up to 3 additional ships to W2-2 and S-Rank the boss

290.name: Saury Fishing: Let's catch some sauries!
290.desc: Defeat the enemy fleet positioned in the fisheries of Northern and Perimeter Zone and obtain 3 sauries!

291.name: Saury Fishing: We need to catch even more sauries!
291.desc: It might be a bit tiring, but you have to secure the safety of the fisheries and get 10 sauries!

292.name: Saury Fishing: You can try even harder!
292.desc: It will be really hard, but you can try to fish sauries even more diligently!

216.name: Daily Sortie 2
216.desc: Defeat the flagship of an abyssal fleet

226.name: Daily Sortie 7
226.desc: Defeat 5 bosses in horned nodes in World 2

214.name: Weekly Sortie 1
214.desc: Sortie 36x, Encounter 24 bosses, Win vs 12 bosses, 6 S-ranks

229.name: Weekly Sortie 6
229.desc: Defeat 12 bosses in horned nodes in World 4

243.name: Weekly Sortie 9
243.desc: Sortie to [W5-2] and S-rank the boss node 2 times

261.name: Weekly Sortie 10
261.desc: Sortie to [W1-5] and A-rank+ the boss node 3 times

249.name: Deploy the Fifth squadron
249.desc: Deploy Myoukou, Nachi, Haguro, +3 ships to [W2-5]. S-rank the boss node

256.name: Deploy a Submarine Fleet to World 6-1
256.desc: Deploy to [W6-1] and obtain an S-rank the boss node 3 times

257.name: Deploy a Torpedo Squadron
257.desc: 1~3 CL (CL flagship) and 3~5 destroyers to [W1-4]. S-rank the boss node

259.name: Deploy a Battleship Squadron
259.desc: Deploy 3 BB(V) (Not FBB) + 1 CL + 2 ships to [W5-1] and S-rank the boss node

265.name: Monthly Escort Duty
265.desc: Deploy a fleet to [W1-5] and A-rank+ the boss node 10 times

264.name: Sortie the Aircraft Carrier Task Force to the West
264.desc: 2 CV + 2 DD + 2 ships to [W4-2]. S-rank the boss node

266.name: Deploy the Counterattack Squadron
266.desc: 4 DD (DD flagship) + 1 CA (Not CAV) + 1 CL to [W2-5] and S-rank the boss node

301.name: First Exercise!
301.desc: Challenge another fleet in practice mode

303.name: Daily Exercises 1
303.desc: Challenge 3 other fleets in practice mode

304.name: Daily Exercises 2
304.desc: Get 5 victories in practice mode within the same day

307.name: Improve the Efficiency of the Fleet
307.desc: Get 3 victories in practice mode within the same day

308.name: Improve the Efficiency of the Fleet One More Time
308.desc: Get 4 victories in practice mode within the same day

309.name: Extra Training in Preparation for Another Rush to the Northern Sea
309.desc: Get 4 victories in practice mode within the same day

311.name: Elite Fleet Practice
311.desc: Get 7 victories in Exercises within the same day

409.name: Strategy Meeting with Overseas Submarine Dispatch!

412.name: Strengthen the Operation of the BBV

411.name: Weekly Expedition 3
411.desc: (Weekly) Complete expedition 37 or 38 a total of 7 times

413.name: Strengthen the Operation of the BBV (Cont.)

420.name: Enhance the Use of the Task Force

605.name: Daily Development 1
605.desc: Craft a piece of equipment (Failures are OK)

607.name: Daily Development 2
607.desc: Craft 3 pieces of equipment (Failures are OK)

614.name: Model Conversion (Tomonaga Squadron to Tenzan)
614.desc: Have flagship equipped with Type 97 Torpedo Bomber (Tomonaga Squadron), then scrap 2 Tenzan

615.name: Model Conversion (Egusa Squadron to Suisei)
615.desc: Have flagship equipped with Type 99 Dive Bomber (Egusa Squadron), then scrap 2 Suisei

616.name: Model Conversion (601 Air Group to Reppuu)
616.desc: Have flagship equipped with Zero Fighter Type 52 Type C (601 Air Group), then scrap 2 Reppuu

622.name: Model Conversion (Murata Squadron to Tenzan)
622.desc: Have Shoukaku equipped with Type 97 Torpedo Bomber (Murata Squadron) as flagship and then scrap 2 Tenzan (Heavenly Mountain)

623.name: Organize the Elite Type 97 Torpedo Bomber Force
623.desc: Have Shoukaku or Akagi as flagship and then scrap 3 Type 97 Torpedo Bomber

611.name: In Preparation of Love! (Part 1)
611.desc: Scrap equipment 2 times to show your love!

306.name: In Preparation of Love (Part 2)
306.desc: Show your love by getting 2 victories in practice mode.

281.name: Carry Out the Patrol for Main Force's Route

158.name: Assign the Murata Squadron Torpedo Bomber to Akagi
158.desc: Set Akagi as the Secretary Ship and equip her with Type 97 Torpedo Bomber (Murata Squadron)

282.name: Snatch Away the Air Superiority in the Solomon Sea Area

159.name: Reassign the Murata Squadron Torpedo Bomber to Shoukaku
159.desc: Set Shoukaku as the Secretary Ship and equip her with Type 97 Torpedo Bomber (Murata Squadron)

310.name: Naval Practice in Preparation for Operation FS

621.name: Model Conversion (Murata Squadron to Tenzan)
621.desc: Have Shoukaku as the Secretary Ship and equip her with Type 97 Torpedo Bomber (Murata Squadron), then scrap 2 Tenzan

160.name: Organize the Third Fleet of the Carrier Task Force
160.desc: Create a Carrier Task Force (Combined Fleet) containing Shoukaku, Zuikaku and Zuihou in the first fleet

284.name: Establish a Bridgehead to Operation FS
